title: remove run_tests.sh from the tree and doc

comments.content:
run_tests.sh has been deprecated over tox.  We should remove it from the tree and change the docs to reflect this

http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/devref/development.environment.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tjones-i

comments.content:
I'm in favor of this change, but run_tests.sh offers some useful functionality that tox by itself doesn't.  See the abandoned attempt at this https://review.openstack.org/#/c/76627/ for details.  Essentially run_tests.sh allows running tests in a customized virtualenv which is useful for various reasons.

There's a feature request to tox at https://bitbucket.org/hpk42/tox/issue/153/support-running-tests-on-an-existant which would cover this.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alaski

comments.content: Im looking at the feature request now.
